name: Sophia Genetics SA
description: Sophia Genetics SA is a pioneering biotechnology company that specializes in data-driven medicine. Founded in 2011, the company is headquartered in Fribourg, Switzerland, and focuses on enhancing patient outcomes through advanced genomic analysis and artificial intelligence. Sophia Genetics aims to democratize data-driven medicine by providing healthcare professionals with tools that integrate genomic data into clinical workflows. Their proprietary platform, Sophia DDM (Data-Driven Medicine), enables hospitals and laboratories to analyze complex genomic data and generate actionable insights for personalized treatment plans. By collaborating with a global network of healthcare institutions, Sophia Genetics contributes to the advancement of precision medicine, particularly in oncology, hereditary diseases, and rare disorders. The company's mission is to empower healthcare professionals to leverage the potential of genomic data to improve patient care and foster a more effective healthcare system. With a commitment to innovation and collaboration, Sophia Genetics continues to expand its reach in the rapidly evolving field of genomics and precision medicine.
